#include<stdio.h>
#define f for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define min(a, b) (((a) <= (b)) ? (a) : (b))
#define max(a, b) (((a) >= (b)) ? (a) : (b))
#define ll long long int
int main(){
	ll n, q, t; scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &q); ll a[n], i, mi, ma;
	f scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
	mi = ma = a[0];
	f mi = min(mi, a[i]), ma = max(ma, a[i]);
	while(q-- && scanf("%lld", &t))	(t >= mi && t <= ma) ? printf("Yes\n") : printf("No\n");
	return 0;
}
